Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Boublenza Command Center — Full premium dashboard

13 pages, 22 API routes:
- Core: Dashboard, Production, Ventes, Stocks
- IA: Slides multi-model, Import Excel, Prévisions & Marchés
- Premium Glencore: War Room \(dark mode\), Commodity Intelligence,
  Risk Management, Supply Chain, Commercial Intelligence, Executive Reporting

Tech: Next.js 15 + Prisma SQLite + Recharts + Tailwind + react-simple-maps + framer-motion
EOF
\)")
